text: Consumer behaviour or behavior is a study on how consumers behave when they are buying a product. It includes studying their emotions, lifestyle, and personality and how it affects their buying behaviour. == Factors == There are many factors that affect consumer behaviour. These include: * Culture - This talks about the general culture or overall culture of a group of people. * Social factors - This talks about the behavior and culture of small groups such as their family and friends * Personal factors - This talks about their age and what they can afford to buy. * Psychological factors - This talks about what they believe in, their motivation and their attitude. Category:Marketing
title: Consumer behaviour
